School.zh: 大規模開放式線上課程

Useful Phrases.en: Can I try this on?
Where is the nearest supermarket?
How do I use this?
I’m looking for the train station.
Can you show me on the map?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以在地圖上指給我看嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Is there a pharmacy nearby?
Can I have some napkins?
Useful Phrases.zh: 可以給我一些餐巾紙嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Can I have a glass of water?
I’m allergic to peanuts.
Do you have vegetarian options?
Can you take a picture for me?
I’m here on vacation.
Can you write it down?
Do you have this in a bigger size?
Useful Phrases.zh: 這個有大一點的尺寸嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Do you have this in a smaller size?
Useful Phrases.zh: 這個有小一點的尺寸嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Where is the information desk?
Can I get a map of the city?
Useful Phrases.zh: 可以給我一張城市地圖嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Is there a bus stop near here?
Can you speak English?
Can you repeat that?
Where is the nearest hospital?
I need help.
Call the police.
Call an ambulance.
I lost my bag.
I lost my passport.
I need a doctor.
Where is the embassy?
I need a charger.
Where can I buy medicine?
I’m looking for a restaurant.
Can I see the menu?
Do you have an English menu?
Can I get the same as that?
Useful Phrases.zh: 我可以點跟那個一樣的嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Is this spicy?
I can’t eat spicy food.
This is too salty.
This is too sweet.
This is too hot.
This is too cold.
Could I have the check, please?
Is tip included?
Do I need to tip?
Where can I buy a ticket?
How much is the ticket?
When does it leave?
When does it arrive?
Is this the right platform?
Do I need a reservation?
Can I book it online?
Where is the exit?
Where is the entrance?
Is this seat free?
Can I get a blanket?
Can I get some water, please?
Can I have some ice?
Where can I exchange money?
What is the exchange rate?
Do you have a business card?
Can you send it to my email?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以寄到我的電子郵件嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: What’s your phone number?
Do you use WhatsApp?
Do you use LINE?
Can I borrow a pen?
Can you lend me some money?
Where is the nearest gas station?
Fill it up, please.
I have a reservation.
I don’t have a reservation.
Can I pay by card?
Cash only?
Where can I smoke?
Is smoking allowed?
I’m in a hurry.
Please hurry up.
It’s urgent.
Take your time.
No rush.
It’s okay.
Don’t worry.
What happened?
Be careful.
Watch out!
I’m looking for a charger.
Do you have any recommendations?
I’m allergic to peanuts.
Can I get a refund?
Could you show me the way?
What’s the exchange rate?
Could I see the menu, please?
Can I pay by credit card?
What time does it open?
What time does it close?
Could you write that down?
Do you have this in another size?
How far is it from here?
Could you call a taxi for me?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以幫我叫計程車嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Where can I exchange money?
I’d like to make a reservation.
Is service included?
Could you pack this to go?
Is there a hospital nearby?
Could you help me translate this?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以幫我翻譯這個嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: I’ve lost my wallet.
My phone is out of battery.
Could you take me to the airport?
Where is the nearest ATM?
Can I try this on?
Could you recommend a hotel?
I need some water, please.
I’d like to cancel my order.
What’s the password for the Wi-Fi?
Could you lower the price?
Is there public transportation nearby?
Useful Phrases.zh: 附近有大眾交通工具嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Do you have vegetarian options?
Could I have the bill, please?
Where can I buy a SIM card?
Is there a pharmacy nearby?
Could you recommend a local dish?
Can I pay in cash?
How long will it take to get there?
Could you take a picture for us?
Is there a supermarket nearby?
Could you tell me how to get to the train station?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以告訴我怎麼去火車站嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Is there a bus that goes there?
Can I have a map, please?
Could you recommend a tourist spot?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以推薦一個景點嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: How much is the entrance fee?
Could I have some extra napkins?
Useful Phrases.zh: 可以給我一些額外的餐巾紙嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Can I get this gift-wrapped?
Useful Phrases.zh: 可以幫我包裝成禮物嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Is this seat taken?
Could you make it less spicy?
Can I have this without nuts?
Could you keep my luggage for a while?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以幫我寄放行李一下嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Is there a direct train to the airport?
Can I get a receipt, please?
Could you recommend a good coffee shop nearby?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以推薦附近的好咖啡廳嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Where can I buy tickets for this event?
Useful Phrases.zh: 我在哪裡可以買這個活動的票？

Useful Phrases.en: Is there somewhere I can change clothes?
Useful Phrases.zh: 有地方可以讓我換衣服嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Could you tell me the weather forecast?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以告訴我天氣預報嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Can you tell me the way to the museum?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以告訴我去博物館的路嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Could I have some water with no ice?
Useful Phrases.zh: 可以給我不加冰的水嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Is there a bus stop around here?
Can I get this in a different color?
Could you hold the door, please?
Is there a place to sit down?
That doesn’t make sense to me.
Could you elaborate on that in more detail so I can fully understand your perspective?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以更詳細地說明，以便我能完全理解你的觀點嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Let’s negotiate the price and terms to see if we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們來談談價格和條款，看能否找到對雙方都有利的安排。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you clarify your point and give a concrete example to illustrate it better?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以說清楚你的意思，並舉一個具體例子來更好地說明嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: What are the exact terms and conditions stated in the agreement we are about to sign?
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們即將簽署的協議中，具體的條款與細則是什麼？

Useful Phrases.en: Could you provide a detailed breakdown of all the costs involved in this transaction?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以提供這筆交易中所有相關費用的詳細明細嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: I’d like to formally file a complaint regarding the service I received yesterday.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我想正式提出關於我昨天所收到服務的申訴。

Useful Phrases.en: Can we reach a mutual agreement today so we can move forward with the project without delays?
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們今天能達成共識，好讓專案能不延誤地繼續推進嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Please confirm in writing so that there is an official record of our agreement.
Useful Phrases.zh: 請以書面確認，以便我們有正式的協議紀錄。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you expedite the process since the deadline is approaching rapidly?
Useful Phrases.zh: 由於截止日期即將到來，你能加快流程嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: This level of quality is unacceptable and must be addressed immediately.
Useful Phrases.zh: 這樣的品質是不能接受的，必須立即處理。

Useful Phrases.en: I appreciate your cooperation in resolving this issue as soon as possible.
Useful Phrases.zh: 感謝你盡快解決此問題的合作。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you arrange alternative transportation in case our original plan doesn’t work out?
Useful Phrases.zh: 如果原本的交通安排無法實現，你可以安排其他交通工具嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Let’s review the contract together to ensure that all clauses are fair and clear.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們一起檢查合約，確保所有條款公平且清楚。

Useful Phrases.en: Please keep me updated with regular progress reports so I know how things are going.
Useful Phrases.zh: 請定期更新進度報告，讓我知道事情的進展狀況。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you extend the deadline to give us more time to complete the necessary tasks?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以延長期限，好讓我們有更多時間完成必要的工作嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: What’s your final offer, including all discounts and possible concessions?
Useful Phrases.zh: 包含所有折扣和可能讓步的情況下，你的最終報價是多少？

Useful Phrases.en: Could you summarize the main points of the meeting for those who couldn’t attend?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以為沒能參加的人總結一下會議重點嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: I’d like to discuss this in private before making a public statement.
Useful Phrases.zh: 在公開發表聲明之前，我想私下討論這件事。

Useful Phrases.en: This requires urgent attention and should be prioritized over other tasks.
Useful Phrases.zh: 這件事需要立即關注，應優先於其他任務處理。

Useful Phrases.en: I’ll need that information documented in an official report for our records.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我需要將該資訊記錄在正式報告中作為我們的存檔。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you verify the accuracy of this information before we proceed further?
Useful Phrases.zh: 在我們進一步行動之前，你可以驗證這些資訊的準確性嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Let’s schedule a follow-up meeting to address any remaining concerns.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們安排一次後續會議，來處理任何剩餘的問題。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you coordinate with the team to ensure everyone is aligned on the plan?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以和團隊協調，確保每個人都對計畫有共識嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: This proposal needs further review before we can approve it officially.
Useful Phrases.zh: 這份提案在正式核准之前需要進一步審查。

Useful Phrases.en: Can we finalize the agreement today so that implementation can begin immediately?
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們今天能敲定協議，以便馬上開始執行嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Could you ensure compliance with all relevant regulations and industry standards?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以確保符合所有相關法規和產業標準嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Please address this issue immediately to avoid further complications.
Useful Phrases.zh: 請立即處理這個問題，以免造成進一步的複雜情況。

Useful Phrases.en: We need to renegotiate the contract terms to reflect the recent changes.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們需要重新談判合約條款，以反映最近的變化。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you send me a comprehensive report with all supporting documents attached?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以發一份包含所有支援文件的完整報告給我嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Please make sure all stakeholders are informed before we move to the next phase.
Useful Phrases.zh: 在進入下一階段前，請確保所有相關人員都已被通知。

Useful Phrases.en: I’d like to request an official statement from your organization regarding this matter.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我想請貴組織針對此事發表正式聲明。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you arrange a formal meeting with the decision-makers to speed up approval?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以安排與決策者的正式會議，以加快核准進度嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Please review the attached documents carefully before signing the agreement.
Useful Phrases.zh: 在簽署協議之前，請仔細審閱附加的文件。

Useful Phrases.en: We need a contingency plan in case the current strategy doesn’t work as expected.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們需要一個應變計畫，以防目前策略未如預期運作。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you provide references from previous clients to support your proposal?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以提供過去客戶的推薦信來支持你的提案嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Let’s ensure all contractual obligations are met before closing the project.
Useful Phrases.zh: 在結束專案之前，我們要確保所有合約義務都已履行。

Useful Phrases.en: Please ensure that all data is backed up before performing the system upgrade.
Useful Phrases.zh: 在進行系統升級之前，請確保所有資料已備份。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you prepare a cost-benefit analysis for us to review at the next meeting?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以準備一份成本效益分析，讓我們在下次會議上檢視嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: This matter is time-sensitive and requires immediate action from all departments.
Useful Phrases.zh: 此事時間緊迫，需要所有部門立即行動。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you draft a formal proposal that outlines all the key deliverables and timelines?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以起草一份正式提案，列出所有主要交付項目和時間表嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Please make the necessary arrangements for the upcoming conference next month.
Useful Phrases.zh: 請為下個月即將舉行的會議做必要安排。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you update the financial forecast based on the latest market data?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以根據最新的市場數據更新財務預測嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: We should evaluate potential risks before committing to this investment.
Useful Phrases.zh: 在承諾這項投資之前，我們應該先評估潛在風險。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you compile all feedback from clients into a single organized report?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以將所有客戶回饋整理成一份有條理的報告嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Please secure the necessary approvals before initiating the construction phase.
Useful Phrases.zh: 在開始施工階段之前，請取得必要的核准。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you arrange a training session for the staff on the new procedures?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以為員工安排新流程的培訓課程嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Let’s establish clear communication channels to avoid misunderstandings.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們建立清晰的溝通管道，以避免誤解。

Useful Phrases.en: Please verify the authenticity of these documents with the issuing authority.
Useful Phrases.zh: 請向發證機關驗證這些文件的真實性。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you monitor the progress and send me weekly status updates?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以監控進度並每週發送狀態更新給我嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: We need to conduct a full audit to ensure compliance with all policies.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們需要進行全面稽核，以確保遵守所有政策。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you confirm the availability of the venue before we send out invitations?
Useful Phrases.zh: 在我們發送邀請之前，你可以確認場地是否可用嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Please draft an agenda for the upcoming strategic planning session.
Useful Phrases.zh: 請為即將到來的策略規劃會議擬定議程。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you ensure all invoices are paid before the end of the fiscal year?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以確保在會計年度結束前支付所有發票嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: We should arrange a press release to announce the launch of the new product.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們應該安排新聞稿來宣布新產品的發佈。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you organize the project timeline into clear, achievable milestones?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以把專案時間表整理成清晰且可達成的里程碑嗎？

Useful Phrases.en: Let’s identify the key risks and develop mitigation strategies for each.
Useful Phrases.zh: 我們來找出主要風險，並為每項風險制定緩解策略。

Useful Phrases.en: Please circulate the updated guidelines to all team members by tomorrow.
Useful Phrases.zh: 請在明天前將更新的指引發送給所有團隊成員。

Useful Phrases.en: Could you prepare a presentation summarizing our quarterly performance?
Useful Phrases.zh: 你可以準備一份總結我們季度表現的簡報嗎？
